column2: SPR Malaysia, WARTA KERAJAAN DAERAH MENGUNDI, PUSAT MENGUNDIAN WAKTU MENGUNDI NEGERI-NEGERI TANAH MELAYU,SABAH DAN SARAWAK 2013

Users to exercise discretion when using the dataset. Gaps and overlaps between Daerah Mengundis, DUNs and Parliament Seats are found across the state. While every effort has been undertaken to ensure the accuracy, we are not responsible for errors and omission that are arising from the dataset.
